src_original: candanarathān dadāno ratnacakrarathyaprayuktān  ratnasiṃhâsanapratiṣṭhitān yāvan nānāratnachatrasaṃchannavyūhān  ratnavitānavitatasaṃchannān dhvajapatākâlaṃkṛtacaturdi-  nānāgandhavidhūpita ... sāragandhânulepânuliptān /
tgt_original: 其寶輪相與車相稱，又於其上置諸妙寶師子之座，乃至設眾寶蓋遍覆其上，莊嚴寶帳周匝圍繞，於四方面植妙幢幡燒種種香，諸妙堅香以為塗拭，散諸妙花遍覆莊嚴。

src_original: sarvapuṣpavyūhâvakīrṇān kanyāśatasahasraratnasūtraprakarṣitān abhrāntagamanān abhrântasamavāhanaprayuktān /  yāvad apratikūlamanojñapravātagandhān  vividhagandhacūrṇasambhṛtakṛtôpacārān iti //
tgt_original: 又於其上百千妓女寶繩交絡，彼善御者正等和合行無錯亂，乃至以諸粖香變異和合，雖聞此香意樂第一，令彼男女性行調適。

src_original: punar atrâivâha /  ātmānaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niryātayann upasthānaṃ vā  sarvabuddhānām upādadāno rājyaṃ vā parityajan
tgt_original: 復如彼說，為諸眾生當捨己身，承事諸佛之所攝受，或捨轉輪王位、國城宮殿一切勝莊嚴具。

src_original: paṭabhedakaṃ vā nagararājadhānīṃ sarvâlaṃkārabhūṣitāṃ yathârhaṃ vā yācanakeṣu sarvaparivāraṃ parityajan  putraduhitṛbhāryāṃ vā dadāno yācanakebhyaḥ sarvagṛhaṃ vâpasṛjan /  yāvat sarvôpabhogaparibhogān vā dadānaḥ /
tgt_original: 如其乞者，捨諸眷屬男女妻妾舍宅人民，乃至或全或分，一切捨施。

src_original: evaṃ pānadānaṃ rasadānam api bodhisatvo dadāno vividhān  kalyāṇān udārān viśuddhān avikalāṃs tiktāṃl lavaṇān  kaṭakān kaṣāyān nānārasâgrôpetān susnigdhān  vividharasavidhinôpetān dhātukṣobhaṇasamatāsthāpanān  cittaśarīrabalôpastambhanān prītiprasādaprāmodyakalpatājananān /
tgt_original: 如是飲食滋味，而菩薩具捨種種淨妙飲膳，苦辣醎淡種種上味，遍滋大種柔滑光澤，調適身心安住色力。

src_original: yāvat sarvaparôpakramapratiṣedhakān  sarvavyādhisamanârogyasaṃjananān /
tgt_original: 乃至諸所至處愈諸疾病，悉令安樂。

src_original: evaṃ vastradānaṃ puṣpadānaṃ gandhadānaṃ vilepanadānaṃ mālyadānaṃ /  śayanadānam āvāsadānam apāśrayadānaṃ pradīpadānaṃ ca /  glānapratyayabhaiṣajya-  pariṣkārān bodhisatvo 'nuprayacchan
tgt_original: 如是燈明、粖香塗香、華鬘衣服、床敷几案、房舍臥具、病緣醫藥，而菩薩隨其給與。

src_original: tatra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā  buddhasaṃjñôtpādayitavyā śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā /  sa dharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ /
tgt_original: 謂信善男子善女人生諸佛想、作議論想，聞善法故。

src_original: yāvan nānābhājanāni vividhasaṃbhārāṇy anekakāṃsyapātrīr aprameyasaṃbhārôpacitā hiraṇyasuvarṇarūpyacūrṇaparipūrṇās  tāni buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyo dadāno 'cintyadakṣiṇīyâdhimuktacetā bodhisatvaratnebhyo vā dadānaḥ /
tgt_original: 乃至種種廣大器具，謂無量無數金銀銅鉢滿中珍寶，供佛世尊，起不思議尊重信解等心；

src_original: kalyāṇamitrasudurlabhacittôtpādenâryasaṃghāya vā
tgt_original: 或施菩薩善知識等，發希有心；

src_original: buddhaśāsanôpastambhāya pudgalāya vā dadānaḥ /  śrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyo vâryaguṇasuprasannacittatayā
tgt_original: 或施住佛教者一切聖眾聲聞緣覺補特伽羅，發清淨心；

src_original: mātāpitṛbhyāṃ dadāno /  guruśuśrūṣôpasthānacittatayâcāryagurudakṣiṇīyebhyo vā  dadānas tatra tatra gurusaṃbhārâvavādaśikṣaṇaprayuktaḥ /
tgt_original: 或施父母諸阿闍梨及餘師尊，發起尊重親近承事求學等心；

src_original: aśanavasanaṃ vā kṛpaṇavanīpakayācanakebhyo dadānaḥ /  sarvasatvâpratihatacakṣur maitrīparibhāvitacittatayā /  peyālaṃ //
tgt_original: 或施歉乏困苦之者，於諸眾生作無礙眼發慈愍心。

src_original: iti hi bodhisatvo hastyājāneyān dadānaḥ  saptâṅgasupratiṣṭhitān /  ṣaṣṭihā-  [ Bendall ed p28 ---> ]  yanān ṣaḍgantrôpetān padmavarṇān mukhaviśuddhān  suvarṇâlaṃkārān hemajālapraticchannaśarīrān  nānāratnavicitrâlaṃkārajālaśuṇḍaprakṣiptavyūhān
tgt_original: 以要言之，若菩薩樂施象乘，七支安住高六十尺、六牙具足面目清淨如蓮華色，金繩交絡莊嚴身相、種種雜寶巧妙間飾，其鼻舉擲金色殊妙，行千踰繕那觀者無厭。
